thread.section_title: KILL CLIFF Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of KILL CLIFF | killcliff.com | 2 of 96
thread.title: John Manser
thread.title_full: KILL CLIFF reviewed by John Manser

author: John Manser
title: John Manser
text:
My community of members was overall not pleased with the unexpected changes to the taste of their favorite flavor, Blood Orange. It would have been nice to let those receiving it, that the change was coming and why. We may be moving away from the brand altogether due to the aftertaste as Sales are down by 2/3rds.
Your rep, Lauren Rothschild, however, made a very favorable impression on me today. Still not happy with the product, but do like how she's trying to keep my business. It was done deal before we talked that we wouldn't be carrying it any further.
